name: Troll Hunt - The Hunted One
description:
It is my first game , it is a simple one . 

You choose to became troll or the hunted one. 

If you choose troll , you must hunt the human .

If you choose human , you must run from the troll.

10 Levels so far , the final game will be 25 levels. 

Please report back any bugs or issues. Thanks in advance.
